attributes.action: Ban cigarette sales to reduce the impact on limited ventilator & ICU capacity.
attributes.additional_details: Smoking cigarettes will exacerbate the symptoms of coronavirus amongst infected smokers. Not smoking may reduce the symptoms allowing infected smokers to stay at home thereby lessening the load on the NHS.
attributes.background: Immediately ban the sale of cigarettes whilst there is a chance of coronavirus infection in the country.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310248

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
